metadata.title: SuperChat for Odoo 18 — CRM Automation & Multi-Channel Messaging | Persevida es
metadata.description: Automate your Odoo 18 CRM: web form leads, stage-change notifications, team assignment and messaging across WhatsApp, Instagram, Telegram, Email, SMS. 7 open source modules.

hero.subtitle: CRM & Automation for Odoo 18
hero.description: Capture leads from the web, automate notifications, assign to the right team — on WhatsApp, Email and 4 more channels

about.subtitle: About Us
about.description: SuperChat transforms Odoo 18 into an automatic sales machine: from first contact to qualified lead, every step is tracked and automated.

features.subtitle: Features
features.title: Power and Simplicity
features.description: Free your team from repetitive tasks

inbox.title: Unified Multi-Channel Inbox
inbox.description: Manage WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook Messenger, Email, SMS and Telegram from a single 3-column interface directly in Odoo.

crm.title: CRM Lead Module
crm.description: Every web form creates a lead in Odoo automatically. Stage-change triggers send custom templates to clients and notifications to the sales team.

marketing.title: Marketing Automation
marketing.description: Automated workflows based on lead status: email + WhatsApp on qualification, reminders on inactivity, multi-step nurturing with conditional branching.

assignment.title: Assignment & Roles
assignment.description: Dedicated assignment screen: assign leads and conversations to team members. Instant notifications, granular User/Assignator/Admin permissions.

crmWorkflow.subtitle: CRM Flow
crmWorkflow.title: From Web Form to Team
crmWorkflow.description: Every lead follows an automated path: capture, qualify, notify, assign. Zero manual intervention.

formCapture.label: Web Form
formCapture.description: The prospect fills out the form on your site

leadCreation.label: Odoo Lead
leadCreation.description: Lead automatically created in the CRM

notification.label: Notification
notification.description: WhatsApp + Email to the team and the prospect

teamAssignment.label: Assignment
teamAssignment.description: The manager assigns the lead to a sales rep

autoLead.title: Automatic Lead Creation
autoLead.description: Every form submitted on the site generates a lead in Odoo CRM with all data pre-filled. No manual action, zero lost leads.

multiChannelNotifications.title: Multi-Channel Status Notifications
multiChannelNotifications.description: When the lead changes stage — new, qualified, proposal — the right template is automatically sent via WhatsApp and Email.

assignmentDashboard.title: Assignment Dashboard
assignmentDashboard.description: A dedicated screen for the team leader: see all incoming leads, assign with one click, the sales rep receives instant notification.

midCta.text: Zero lost leads, automatic notifications on every stage change, one-click assignment. Your CRM works for you.

builtForYou.subtitle: Modules
builtForYou.title: 7 Modules, One Complete
builtForYou.description: Each module adds a specific capability. Install only what you need.

base.title: SuperChat Base
base.description: The core of the system: API, webhooks, 6-channel management and real-time event queue

chatter.title: Chatter Interface
chatter.description: 3-column chat interface with 17 reactive OWL components and full-text search

chatterExtend.title: Chatter Extension
chatterExtend.description: WhatsApp button in any Odoo module with mail.thread — reply from quotes, tickets, orders

crm.title: CRM Integration
crm.description: Automatic lead creation from web forms, stage-change template triggers, dynamic variables from lead data, chatter logging

sale.title: Sale Integration
sale.description: Fast quote sending via WhatsApp + Email with portal link and automatic confirmation

campaign.title: Campaign
campaign.description: Mass WhatsApp campaigns with scheduling, rate limiting, progress tracking and delivery reports

marketingAuto.title: Marketing Automation
marketingAuto.description: Multi-step workflows in Odoo Enterprise Marketing Automation: WhatsApp + Email + SMS with lead status and inactivity branching

benefits.subtitle: Benefits
benefits.title: Your Benefits
benefits.description: From lead to sale: CRM automation, smart notifications and team assignment natively integrated in Odoo.

channels.title: 6 Channels, Zero External Apps
channels.description: WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, Email, SMS, Telegram — all in one native Odoo inbox.

leadAutomation.title: Lead Automation
leadAutomation.description: Web form → Odoo lead → sales notification. Automatic triggers on every stage change, dynamic variables from lead data, retry and chatter logging.

marketingAutomation.title: Marketing Automation
marketingAutomation.description: Multi-step workflows based on lead status: welcome on qualification, reminders on inactivity, automatic escalation to manager. WhatsApp + Email + SMS.

teamAssignment.title: Team Assignment
teamAssignment.description: Assignment dashboard for team leaders: view incoming leads and conversations, assign with one click to the right rep. Instant notifications, granular roles.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: 3-level system (User/Assignator/Admin), UUID-protected webhooks, method whitelist, LGPL-3 license.

useCases.subtitle: Use Cases
useCases.title: SuperChat Works
useCases.description: From logistics to marketing, every team finds its channel

salesManager.description: See all incoming leads in the dashboard. Assign each lead to the right rep with one click, instant notification. Monitor who follows what, without meetings.

b2b.description: The prospect fills out the form, the lead arrives in Odoo, the WhatsApp template goes to the sales rep. Automatic follow-up if no response in 48h.

marketing.description: Automated workflows based on stage: welcome on qualification, proposal on interest, reminder on inactivity. Multi-channel nurturing without manual intervention.

ecommerce.description: Order confirmations, shipment tracking and mass promotional campaigns on WhatsApp. Post-sale support becomes immediate.

professional.description: Appointment reminders, booking confirmations and urgent communications. Everything managed centrally from Odoo without external apps.

support.description: Tickets from WhatsApp, email and live chat converge in a single queue. Quick responses with templates, automatic escalation and SLAs monitored directly in Odoo Helpdesk.

howToUse.subtitle: Get Started
howToUse.title: Ready in 3 Steps
howToUse.description: From installation to your first automated lead in minutes. No complex configuration.

install.title: Install Modules
install.description: Download and install superchat_base in the Odoo 18 addons directory

configure.title: Configure Workspace
configure.description: Enter SuperChat API credentials and enable webhooks in Settings

automate.title: Automated Leads & Chats
automate.description: Leads arrive from the web, notifications fire automatically and the team gets assigned — all inside Odoo

privacyPage.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for SuperChat for Odoo 18 by Persevida es. Learn how we collect, use and protect your personal data.
privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.s1Text: The Data Controller is <bold>Persevida es</bold>, with registered office in Prague, Czech Republic. For any questions regarding this policy or the processing of your data, you can contact us at: <email>info@fl1.cz</email>.
privacyPage.s2Intro: Through this website, we collect the following types of data:
s2Items: <bold>Voluntarily provided data:</bold> Name, email address, phone number, company name and message submitted via the contact form.
<bold>Browsing data:</bold> IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent and other parameters related to the operating system and computing environment.
privacyPage.s3Intro: Your data is processed for the following purposes:
s3Items: Responding to information requests submitted via the contact form.
Sending the collected data to our <bold>Odoo CRM</bold> system for lead and business opportunity management.
Sending commercial communications or newsletters, only with your explicit consent.
Ensuring site security and preventing fraud or abuse.
privacyPage.s4Intro: We process your data based on the following legal bases under the GDPR:
s4Items: <bold>Consent (Art. 6.1.a):</bold> For sending marketing communications and for activating analytics and marketing cookies.
<bold>Performance of pre-contractual measures (Art. 6.1.b):</bold> To respond to your requests for quotes or information.
<bold>Legitimate interest (Art. 6.1.f):</bold> For improving our services, website security and the use of necessary technical cookies.
privacyPage.s5Intro: Your personal data will not be sold or transferred to third parties. It may only be shared with:
s5Items: Technology service providers necessary for the operation of the website and CRM (e.g., Odoo).
<bold>Google LLC</bold> (Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager) — only if you have consented to analytics cookies.
<bold>Meta Platforms Inc.</bold> (Meta Pixel) — only if you have consented to marketing cookies.
privacyPage.s6Text: Data is stored on servers located within the European Union. If you consent to the use of analytics or marketing cookies, some data may be transferred to <bold>Google LLC</bold> and <bold>Meta Platforms Inc.</bold> in the United States, in compliance with the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
privacyPage.s7Intro: We retain data for the time strictly necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
s7Items: <bold>Contact form data:</bold> 24 months from collection, unless a contractual relationship is established.
privacyPage.s8Intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to:
s8Items: Request rectification or deletion of data.
Object to processing on legitimate grounds.
privacyPage.s8Outro: To exercise these rights, you can send a request to <email>info@fl1.cz</email>.
privacyPage.s9Text: This site uses necessary technical cookies for proper functioning, as well as analytics and marketing cookies with your prior consent via the cookie banner. For more details, please see our <cookieLink>Cookie Policy</cookieLink>.
privacyPage.s10Text: The Data Controller reserves the right to make changes to this policy at any time. Please check this page regularly, referring to the last updated date shown above.

cookiePolicyPage.metaDescription: Cookie Policy for SuperChat for Odoo 18 by Persevida es. Information about the cookies we use, how to manage them and your consent options.
cookiePolicyPage.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicyPage.s1Text: Cookies are small text files that websites visited by the user send to their device (usually the browser), where they are stored to be retransmitted to the same sites on the user's next visit.
cookiePolicyPage.s2Intro: This site uses the following cookie categories:
cookiePolicyPage.s2NecessaryText: Essential for the site to function. They include session management, browsing preferences, and storing the cookie choice (<bold>cookie_consent</bold>). Duration: session or 1 year. No consent required.
cookiePolicyPage.s2AnalyticsText: Loaded only after your explicit consent via the cookie banner. They use <bold>Google Tag Manager</bold> and <bold>Google Analytics 4</bold> to understand visitor behavior, most visited pages and traffic sources. Duration: up to 2 years. Provider: Google LLC.
cookiePolicyPage.s2MarketingText: Loaded only after your explicit consent via the cookie banner. They use <bold>Meta Pixel (Facebook)</bold> for conversion tracking and targeted advertising. Duration: up to 1 year. Provider: Meta Platforms Inc.
cookiePolicyPage.s3Text: On your first visit to the site, a banner is displayed allowing you to choose which cookie categories to accept. You can:
s3Items: <bold>Reject all</bold> non-necessary cookies (only technical cookies active).
cookiePolicyPage.s3Outro: Your choice is saved in the <bold>cookie_consent</bold> cookie (duration: 365 days). You can change your preferences at any time by clearing your browser cookies.
cookiePolicyPage.s4Intro: The site may incorporate the following third-party services:
s4Items: <bold>Google Analytics / Google Tag Manager</bold> — web analytics service provided by Google LLC. Activated only with user consent.
<bold>Meta Pixel</bold> — conversion tracking service provided by Meta Platforms Inc. Activated only with user consent.
<bold>Cloudflare Turnstile</bold> — anti-spam service used in the contact form. Privacy-friendly, does not track users and does not install profiling cookies.
cookiePolicyPage.s5Text: Pursuant to Art. 5(3) of the ePrivacy Directive and Art. 6 of the GDPR: <bold>necessary cookies</bold> do not require consent (legitimate interest, Art. 6.1.f). <bold>Analytics and marketing cookies</bold> are loaded only after explicit user consent (Art. 6.1.a).
cookiePolicyPage.s6Text: If you consent to analytics or marketing cookies, data may be transferred to Google LLC and Meta Platforms Inc. in the United States, in compliance with the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
cookiePolicyPage.s7Intro: You can manage, limit or disable cookies by changing your browser settings:
cookiePolicyPage.s8Text: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to access your data, request rectification, deletion or portability. For any request, contact us at <email>info@fl1.cz</email>.
cookiePolicyPage.s9Text: This policy may be updated periodically to reflect technical or regulatory changes. We encourage you to regularly check the last updated date.
cookiePolicyPage.s10Text: The Data Controller is <bold>Persevida es</bold>, with registered office in Prague, Czech Republic.
